FuncDef: Configures an IEEE 802.1p value or range to be used as a MAC filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IEEE 802.1p value in decimal. Values-0 to 7.
Specifies a 3-bit mask that can be configured using the decimal integer, hexadecimal or binary format. Values-1 to 7 (decimal). ParamDefault: Default- 7 (decimal)
